ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
OR( CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "Technical_Support"), CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "NOC_Cases") ),
$UserRole.Name = "Technical Support Rep",
ISCHANGED(Status), OR(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed - Unresolved"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed - First Response"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed - No Response") )
,
CONTAINS( JIRA_Status__c , "CS: Pending")
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can't close a case with a CS: Pending Jira. Review the Jira to see if it can be closed, or change the Jira status.
